data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 20,641 believers living in Yamoussoukro, Côte d‘Ivoire.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Yamoussoukro, Côte d‘Ivoire
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 146,585 lost people in  Yamoussoukro, Côte d‘Ivoire have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Father, let every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Yamoussoukro, Côte d‘Ivoire.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Yamoussoukro to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Maninka, Eastern people.
Jesus, help the church in the state of Yamoussoukro to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Yamoussoukro, Côte d‘Ivoire. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.section_summary:
the state of Yamoussoukro, Côte d‘Ivoire has a population of 212,700.

We estimate Yamoussoukro has 20,641 people who might know Jesus, 45,473 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 146,585 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 10 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 20,641 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Yamoussoukro.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.
